    1536                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1537                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1538                 :  * Obtains information about a filetype based on its extension. Will                                                                                                                       
    1539                 :  * use a default if no information is present about that particular                                                                                                                        
    1540                 :  * extension.                                                                                                                                                                              
    1541                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1542                 :  * @category files                                                                                                                                                                         
    1543                 :  * @param string $element Desired information (usually 'icon'                                                                                                                              
    1544                 :  *   for icon filename or 'type' for MIME type. Can also be                                                                                                                                
    1545                 :  *   'icon24', ...32, 48, 64, 72, 80, 96, 128, 256)                                                                                                                                        
    1546                 :  * @param string $filename Filename we're looking up                                                                                                                                       
    1547                 :  * @return string Requested piece of information from array                                                                                                                                
    1548                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1549                 : function mimeinfo($element, $filename) {                                                                                                                                                   
    1550               0 :     global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                           
    1551               0 :     $mimeinfo = & get_mimetypes_array();                                                                                                                                                   
    1552               0 :     static $iconpostfixes = array(256=>'-256', 128=>'-128', 96=>'-96', 80=>'-80', 72=>'-72', 64=>'-64', 48=>'-48', 32=>'-32', 24=>'-24', 16=>'');                                          
    1553                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1554               0 :     $filetype = strtolower(pathinfo($filename, PATHINFO_EXTENSION));                                                                                                                       
    1555               0 :     if (empty($filetype)) {                                                                                                                                                                
    1556               0 :         $filetype = 'xxx'; // file without extension                                                                                                                                       
    1557               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1558               0 :     if (preg_match('/^icon(\d*)$/', $element, $iconsizematch)) {                                                                                                                           
    1559               0 :         $iconsize = max(array(16, (int)$iconsizematch[1]));                                                                                                                                
    1560               0 :         $filenames = array($mimeinfo['xxx']['icon']);                                                                                                                                      
    1561               0 :         if ($filetype != 'xxx' && isset($mimeinfo[$filetype]['icon'])) {                                                                                                                   
    1562               0 :             array_unshift($filenames, $mimeinfo[$filetype]['icon']);                                                                                                                       
    1563               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1564                 :         // find the file with the closest size, first search for specific icon then for default icon                                                                                       
    1565               0 :         foreach ($filenames as $filename) {                                                                                                                                                
    1566               0 :             foreach ($iconpostfixes as $size => $postfix) {                                                                                                                                
    1567               0 :                 $fullname = $CFG->dirroot.'/pix/f/'.$filename.$postfix;                                                                                                                    
    1568               0 :                 if ($iconsize >= $size && (file_exists($fullname.'.png') || file_exists($fullname.'.gif'))) {                                                                              
    1569               0 :                     return $filename.$postfix;                                                                                                                                             
    1570                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    1571               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    1572               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1573               0 :     } else if (isset($mimeinfo[$filetype][$element])) {                                                                                                                                    
    1574               0 :         return $mimeinfo[$filetype][$element];                                                                                                                                             
    1575               0 :     } else if (isset($mimeinfo['xxx'][$element])) {                                                                                                                                        
    1576               0 :         return $mimeinfo['xxx'][$element];   // By default                                                                                                                                 
    1577                 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                               
    1578               0 :         return null;                                                                                                                                                                       
    1579                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1580               0 : }                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1581                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1582                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1583                 :  * Obtains information about a filetype based on the MIME type rather than                                                                                                                 
    1584                 :  * the other way around.                                                                                                                                                                   
    1585                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1586                 :  * @category files                                                                                                                                                                         
    1587                 :  * @param string $element Desired information ('extension', 'icon', 'icon-24', etc.)                                                                                                       
    1588                 :  * @param string $mimetype MIME type we're looking up                                                                                                                                      
    1589                 :  * @return string Requested piece of information from array                                                                                                                                
    1590                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1591                 : function mimeinfo_from_type($element, $mimetype) {                                                                                                                                         
    1592                 :     /* array of cached mimetype->extension associations */                                                                                                                                 
    1593               0 :     static $cached = array();                                                                                                                                                              
    1594               0 :     $mimeinfo = & get_mimetypes_array();                                                                                                                                                   
    1595                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1596               0 :     if (!array_key_exists($mimetype, $cached)) {                                                                                                                                           
    1597               0 :         $cached[$mimetype] = null;                                                                                                                                                         
    1598               0 :         foreach($mimeinfo as $filetype => $values) {                                                                                                                                       
    1599               0 :             if ($values['type'] == $mimetype) {                                                                                                                                            
    1600               0 :                 if ($cached[$mimetype] === null) {                                                                                                                                         
    1601               0 :                     $cached[$mimetype] = '.'.$filetype;                                                                                                                                    
    1602               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    1603               0 :                 if (!empty($values['defaulticon'])) {                                                                                                                                      
    1604               0 :                     $cached[$mimetype] = '.'.$filetype;                                                                                                                                    
    1605               0 :                     break;                                                                                                                                                                 
    1606                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    1607               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    1608               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1609               0 :         if (empty($cached[$mimetype])) {                                                                                                                                                   
    1610               0 :             $cached[$mimetype] = '.xxx';                                                                                                                                                   
    1611               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1612               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1613               0 :     if ($element === 'extension') {                                                                                                                                                        
    1614               0 :         return $cached[$mimetype];                                                                                                                                                         
    1615                 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                               
    1616               0 :         return mimeinfo($element, $cached[$mimetype]);                                                                                                                                     
    1617                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1618                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1619                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1620                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1621                 :  * Return the relative icon path for a given file                                                                                                                                          
    1622                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1623                 :  * Usage:                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1624                 :  * <code>                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1625                 :  * // $file - instance of stored_file or file_info                                                                                                                                         
    1626                 :  * $icon = $OUTPUT->pix_url(file_file_icon($file))->out();                                                                                                                                 
    1627                 :  * echo html_writer::empty_tag('img', array('src' => $icon, 'alt' => get_mimetype_description($file)));                                                                                    
    1628                 :  * </code>                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1629                 :  * or                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1630                 :  * <code>                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1631                 :  * echo $OUTPUT->pix_icon(file_file_icon($file), get_mimetype_description($file));                                                                                                         
    1632                 :  * </code>                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1633                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1634                 :  * @param stored_file|file_info|stdClass|array $file (in case of object attributes $file->filename                                                                                         
    1635                 :  *     and $file->mimetype are expected)                                                                                                                                                   
    1636                 :  * @param int $size The size of the icon. Defaults to 16 can also be 24, 32, 64, 128, 256                                                                                                  
    1637                 :  * @return string                                                                                                                                                                          
    1638                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1639                 : function file_file_icon($file, $size = null) {                                                                                                                                             
    1640               0 :     if (!is_object($file)) {                                                                                                                                                               
    1641               0 :         $file = (object)$file;                                                                                                                                                             
    1642               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1643               0 :     if (isset($file->filename)) {                                                                                                                                                          
    1644               0 :         $filename = $file->filename;                                                                                                                                                       
    1645               0 :     } else if (method_exists($file, 'get_filename')) {                                                                                                                                     
    1646               0 :         $filename = $file->get_filename();                                                                                                                                                 
    1647               0 :     } else if (method_exists($file, 'get_visible_name')) {                                                                                                                                 
    1648               0 :         $filename = $file->get_visible_name();                                                                                                                                             
    1649               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                               
    1650               0 :         $filename = '';                                                                                                                                                                    
    1651                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1652               0 :     if (isset($file->mimetype)) {                                                                                                                                                          
    1653               0 :         $mimetype = $file->mimetype;                                                                                                                                                       
    1654               0 :     } else if (method_exists($file, 'get_mimetype')) {                                                                                                                                     
    1655               0 :         $mimetype = $file->get_mimetype();                                                                                                                                                 
    1656               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                               
    1657               0 :         $mimetype = '';                                                                                                                                                                    
    1658                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1659               0 :     $mimetypes = &get_mimetypes_array();                                                                                                                                                   
    1660               0 :     if ($filename) {                                                                                                                                                                       
    1661               0 :         $extension = strtolower(pathinfo($filename, PATHINFO_EXTENSION));                                                                                                                  
    1662               0 :         if ($extension && !empty($mimetypes[$extension])) {                                                                                                                                
    1663                 :             // if file name has known extension, return icon for this extension                                                                                                            
    1664               0 :             return file_extension_icon($filename, $size);                                                                                                                                  
    1665                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1666               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1667               0 :     return file_mimetype_icon($mimetype, $size);                                                                                                                                           
    1668                 : }

    1670                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1671                 :  * Return the relative icon path for a folder image

    1686                 : function file_folder_icon($iconsize = null) {                                                                                                                                              
    1687               0 :     global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                           
    1688               0 :     static $iconpostfixes = array(256=>'-256', 128=>'-128', 96=>'-96', 80=>'-80', 72=>'-72', 64=>'-64', 48=>'-48', 32=>'-32', 24=>'-24', 16=>'');                                          
    1689               0 :     static $cached = array();                                                                                                                                                              
    1690               0 :     $iconsize = max(array(16, (int)$iconsize));                                                                                                                                            
    1691               0 :     if (!array_key_exists($iconsize, $cached)) {                                                                                                                                           
    1692               0 :         foreach ($iconpostfixes as $size => $postfix) {                                                                                                                                    
    1693               0 :             $fullname = $CFG->dirroot.'/pix/f/folder'.$postfix;                                                                                                                            
    1694               0 :             if ($iconsize >= $size && (file_exists($fullname.'.png') || file_exists($fullname.'.gif'))) {

    1696               0 :                 break;                                                                                                                                                                     
    1697                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    1698               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1699               0 :     }

    1702                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1703                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1704                 :  * Returns the relative icon path for a given mime type                                                                                                                                    
    1705                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1706                 :  * This function should be used in conjunction with $OUTPUT->pix_url to produce                                                                                                            
    1707                 :  * a return the full path to an icon.                                                                                                                                                      
    1708                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1709                 :  * <code>                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1710                 :  * $mimetype = 'image/jpg';                                                                                                                                                                
    1711                 :  * $icon = $OUTPUT->pix_url(file_mimetype_icon($mimetype))->out();                                                                                                                         
    1712                 :  * echo html_writer::empty_tag('img', array('src' => $icon, 'alt' => get_mimetype_description($mimetype)));                                                                                
    1713                 :  * </code>                                                                                                                                                                                 
    1714                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1715                 :  * @category files                                                                                                                                                                         
    1716                 :  * @todo MDL-31074 When an $OUTPUT->icon method is available this function should be altered                                                                                               
    1717                 :  * to conform with that.                                                                                                                                                                   
    1718                 :  * @param string $mimetype The mimetype to fetch an icon for                                                                                                                               
    1719                 :  * @param int $size The size of the icon. Defaults to 16 can also be 24, 32, 64, 128, 256                                                                                                  
    1720                 :  * @return string The relative path to the icon                                                                                                                                            
    1721                 :  */

    1725                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1726                 : /**

    1729                 :  * This function should be used in conjunction with $OUTPUT->pix_url to produce                                                                                                            
    1730                 :  * a return the full path to an icon.

    1732                 :  * <code>                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1733                 :  * $filename = '.jpg';

    1744                 :  * @return string                                                                                                                                                                          
    1745                 :  */

    1749                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1750                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1751                 :  * Obtains descriptions for file types (e.g. 'Microsoft Word document') from the                                                                                                           
    1752                 :  * mimetypes.php language file.                                                                                                                                                            
    1753                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1754                 :  * @param mixed $obj - instance of stored_file or file_info or array/stdClass with field                                                                                                   
    1755                 :  *   'filename' and 'mimetype', or just a string with mimetype (though it is recommended to                                                                                                
    1756                 :  *   have filename); In case of array/stdClass the field 'mimetype' is optional.                                                                                                           
    1757                 :  * @param bool $capitalise If true, capitalises first character of result                                                                                                                  
    1758                 :  * @return string Text description                                                                                                                                                         
    1759                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1760                 : function get_mimetype_description($obj, $capitalise=false) {                                                                                                                               
    1761               0 :     $filename = $mimetype = '';                                                                                                                                                            
    1762               0 :     if (is_object($obj) && method_exists($obj, 'get_filename') && method_exists($obj, 'get_mimetype')) {                                                                                   
    1763                 :         // this is an instance of stored_file                                                                                                                                              
    1764               0 :         $mimetype = $obj->get_mimetype();                                                                                                                                                  
    1765               0 :         $filename = $obj->get_filename();                                                                                                                                                  
    1766               0 :     } else if (is_object($obj) && method_exists($obj, 'get_visible_name') && method_exists($obj, 'get_mimetype')) {                                                                        
    1767                 :         // this is an instance of file_info                                                                                                                                                
    1768               0 :         $mimetype = $obj->get_mimetype();                                                                                                                                                  
    1769               0 :         $filename = $obj->get_visible_name();                                                                                                                                              
    1770               0 :     } else if (is_array($obj) || is_object ($obj)) {

    1821                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1822                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1823                 :  * Returns array of elements of type $element in type group(s)                                                                                                                             
    1824                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    1825                 :  * @param string $element name of the element we are interested in, usually 'type' or 'extension'                                                                                          
    1826                 :  * @param string|array $groups one group or array of groups/extensions/mimetypes                                                                                                           
    1827                 :  * @return array                                                                                                                                                                           
    1828                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1829                 : function file_get_typegroup($element, $groups) {                                                                                                                                           
    1830               0 :     static $cached = array();                                                                                                                                                              
    1831               0 :     if (!is_array($groups)) {                                                                                                                                                              
    1832               0 :         $groups = array($groups);                                                                                                                                                          
    1833               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1834               0 :     if (!array_key_exists($element, $cached)) {                                                                                                                                            
    1835               0 :         $cached[$element] = array();                                                                                                                                                       
    1836               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1837               0 :     $result = array();                                                                                                                                                                     
    1838               0 :     foreach ($groups as $group) {                                                                                                                                                          
    1839               0 :         if (!array_key_exists($group, $cached[$element])) {                                                                                                                                
    1840                 :             // retrieive and cache all elements of type $element for group $group                                                                                                          
    1841               0 :             $mimeinfo = & get_mimetypes_array();                                                                                                                                           
    1842               0 :             $cached[$element][$group] = array();                                                                                                                                           
    1843               0 :             foreach ($mimeinfo as $extension => $value) {                                                                                                                                  
    1844               0 :                 $value['extension'] = '.'.$extension;                                                                                                                                      
    1845               0 :                 if (empty($value[$element])) {                                                                                                                                             
    1846               0 :                     continue;                                                                                                                                                              
    1847                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    1848               0 :                 if (($group === '.'.$extension || $group === $value['type'] ||                                                                                                             
    1849               0 :                         (!empty($value['groups']) && in_array($group, $value['groups']))) &&                                                                                               
    1850               0 :                         !in_array($value[$element], $cached[$element][$group])) {                                                                                                          
    1851               0 :                     $cached[$element][$group][] = $value[$element];                                                                                                                        
    1852               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    1853               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    1854               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1855               0 :         $result = array_merge($result, $cached[$element][$group]);                                                                                                                         
    1856               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1857               0 :     return array_unique($result);                                                                                                                                                          
    1858                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1859                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1860                 : /**

    1867                 :  * file mimetype is in mimetypes in groups $groups

    1870                 : function file_extension_in_typegroup($filename, $groups, $checktype = false) {                                                                                                             
    1871               0 :     $extension = pathinfo($filename, PATHINFO_EXTENSION);                                                                                                                                  
    1872               0 :     if (!empty($extension) && in_array('.'.strtolower($extension), file_get_typegroup('extension', $groups))) {                                                                            
    1873               0 :         return true;                                                                                                                                                                       
    1874                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1875               0 :     return $checktype && file_mimetype_in_typegroup(mimeinfo('type', $filename), $groups);                                                                                                 
    1876                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                          
    1877                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1878                 : /**

    1886                 : function file_mimetype_in_typegroup($mimetype, $groups) {                                                                                                                                  
    1887               0 :     return !empty($mimetype) && in_array($mimetype, file_get_typegroup('type', $groups));                                                                                                  
    1888                 : }

    1901                 : /**

    1904                 : function send_header_404() {                                                                                                                                                               
    1905               0 :     if (substr(php_sapi_name(), 0, 3) == 'cgi') {                                                                                                                                          
    1906               0 :         header("Status: 404 Not Found");                                                                                                                                                   
    1907               0 :     } else {
