    1912                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1913                 :  * Enhanced readfile() with optional acceleration.                                                                                                                                         
    1914                 :  * @param string|stored_file $file                                                                                                                                                         
    1915                 :  * @param string $mimetype                                                                                                                                                                 
    1916                 :  * @param bool $accelerate                                                                                                                                                                 
    1917                 :  * @return void                                                                                                                                                                            
    1918                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    1919                 : function readfile_accel($file, $mimetype, $accelerate) {                                                                                                                                   
    1920               0 :     global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                           
    1921                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1922               0 :     if ($mimetype === 'text/plain') {                                                                                                                                                      
    1923                 :         // there is no encoding specified in text files, we need something consistent                                                                                                      
    1924               0 :         header('Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8');                                                                                                                                 
    1925               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                               
    1926               0 :         header('Content-Type: '.$mimetype);                                                                                                                                                
    1927                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1928                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1929               0 :     $lastmodified = is_object($file) ? $file->get_timemodified() : filemtime($file);                                                                                                       
    1930               0 :     header('Last-Modified: '. gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', $lastmodified) .' GMT');                                                                                                            
    1931                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1932               0 :     if (is_object($file)) {                                                                                                                                                                
    1933               0 :         header('ETag: ' . $file->get_contenthash());                                                                                                                                       
    1934               0 :         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_IF_NONE_MATCH']) and $_SERVER['HTTP_IF_NONE_MATCH'] === $file->get_contenthash()) {                                                                       
    1935               0 :             header('HTTP/1.1 304 Not Modified');                                                                                                                                           
    1936               0 :             return;                                                                                                                                                                        
    1937                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1938               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1939                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1940                 :     // if etag present for stored file rely on it exclusively                                                                                                                              
    1941               0 :     if (!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_IF_MODIFIED_SINCE']) and (empty($_SERVER['HTTP_IF_NONE_MATCH']) or !is_object($file))) {                                                                     
    1942                 :         // get unixtime of request header; clip extra junk off first                                                                                                                       
    1943               0 :         $since = strtotime(preg_replace('/;.*$/', '', $_SERVER["HTTP_IF_MODIFIED_SINCE"]));                                                                                                
    1944               0 :         if ($since && $since >= $lastmodified) {                                                                                                                                           
    1945               0 :             header('HTTP/1.1 304 Not Modified');                                                                                                                                           
    1946               0 :             return;                                                                                                                                                                        
    1947                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1948               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1949                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1950               0 :     if ($accelerate and !empty($CFG->xsendfile)) {                                                                                                                                         
    1951               0 :         if (empty($CFG->disablebyteserving) and $mimetype !== 'text/plain') {                                                                                                              
    1952               0 :             header('Accept-Ranges: bytes');                                                                                                                                                
    1953               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                           
    1954               0 :             header('Accept-Ranges: none');                                                                                                                                                 
    1955                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1956                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1957               0 :         if (is_object($file)) {                                                                                                                                                            
    1958               0 :             $fs = get_file_storage();                                                                                                                                                      
    1959               0 :             if ($fs->xsendfile($file->get_contenthash())) {                                                                                                                                
    1960               0 :                 return;                                                                                                                                                                    
    1961                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    1962                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1963               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                           
    1964               0 :             require_once("$CFG->libdir/xsendfilelib.php");                                                                                                                                 
    1965               0 :             if (xsendfile($file)) {                                                                                                                                                        
    1966               0 :                 return;                                                                                                                                                                    
    1967                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    1968                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    1969               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    1970                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1971               0 :     $filesize = is_object($file) ? $file->get_filesize() : filesize($file);                                                                                                                
    1972                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1973               0 :     header('Last-Modified: '. gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', $lastmodified) .' GMT');                                                                                                            
    1974                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1975               0 :     if ($accelerate and empty($CFG->disablebyteserving) and $mimetype !== 'text/plain') {                                                                                                  
    1976               0 :         header('Accept-Ranges: bytes');                                                                                                                                                    
    1977                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    1978               0 :         if (!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_RANGE']) and strpos($_SERVER['HTTP_RANGE'],'bytes=') !== FALSE) {                                                                                        
    1979                 :             // byteserving stuff - for acrobat reader and download accelerators                                                                                                            
    1980                 :             // see: http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html#sec14.35                                                                                                        
    1981                 :             // inspired by: http://www.coneural.org/florian/papers/04_byteserving.php                                                                                                      
    1982               0 :             $ranges = false;                                                                                                                                                               
    1983               0 :             if (preg_match_all('/(\d*)-(\d*)/', $_SERVER['HTTP_RANGE'], $ranges, PREG_SET_ORDER)) {                                                                                        
    1984               0 :                 foreach ($ranges as $key=>$value) {                                                                                                                                        
    1985               0 :                     if ($ranges[$key][1] == '') {                                                                                                                                          
    1986                 :                         //suffix case                                                                                                                                                      
    1987               0 :                         $ranges[$key][1] = $filesize - $ranges[$key][2];                                                                                                                   
    1988               0 :                         $ranges[$key][2] = $filesize - 1;                                                                                                                                  
    1989               0 :                     } else if ($ranges[$key][2] == '' || $ranges[$key][2] > $filesize - 1) {                                                                                               
    1990                 :                         //fix range length                                                                                                                                                 
    1991               0 :                         $ranges[$key][2] = $filesize - 1;                                                                                                                                  
    1992               0 :                     }                                                                                                                                                                      
    1993               0 :                     if ($ranges[$key][2] != '' && $ranges[$key][2] < $ranges[$key][1]) {                                                                                                   
    1994                 :                         //invalid byte-range ==> ignore header                                                                                                                             
    1995               0 :                         $ranges = false;                                                                                                                                                   
    1996               0 :                         break;                                                                                                                                                             
    1997                 :                     }                                                                                                                                                                      
    1998                 :                     //prepare multipart header                                                                                                                                             
    1999               0 :                     $ranges[$key][0] =  "\r\n--".BYTESERVING_BOUNDARY."\r\nContent-Type: $mimetype\r\n";                                                                                   
    2000               0 :                     $ranges[$key][0] .= "Content-Range: bytes {$ranges[$key][1]}-{$ranges[$key][2]}/$filesize\r\n\r\n";                                                                    
    2001               0 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    2002               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                       
    2003               0 :                 $ranges = false;                                                                                                                                                           
    2004                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2005               0 :             if ($ranges) {                                                                                                                                                                 
    2006               0 :                 if (is_object($file)) {                                                                                                                                                    
    2007               0 :                     $handle = $file->get_content_file_handle();                                                                                                                            
    2008               0 :                 } else {                                                                                                                                                                   
    2009               0 :                     $handle = fopen($file, 'rb');                                                                                                                                          
    2010                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    2011               0 :                 byteserving_send_file($handle, $mimetype, $ranges, $filesize);                                                                                                             
    2012               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2013               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2014               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                               
    2015                 :         // Do not byteserve                                                                                                                                                                
    2016               0 :         header('Accept-Ranges: none');                                                                                                                                                     
    2017                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2018                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2019               0 :     header('Content-Length: '.$filesize);                                                                                                                                                  
    2020                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2021               0 :     if ($filesize > 10000000) {                                                                                                                                                            
    2022                 :         // for large files try to flush and close all buffers to conserve memory                                                                                                           
    2023               0 :         while(@ob_get_level()) {                                                                                                                                                           
    2024               0 :             if (!@ob_end_flush()) {                                                                                                                                                        
    2025               0 :                 break;                                                                                                                                                                     
    2026                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2027               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2028               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2029                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2030                 :     // send the whole file content                                                                                                                                                         
    2031               0 :     if (is_object($file)) {                                                                                                                                                                
    2032               0 :         $file->readfile();                                                                                                                                                                 
    2033               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                               
    2034               0 :         readfile($file);                                                                                                                                                                   
    2035                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2036               0 : }                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2037                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2038                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2039                 :  * Similar to readfile_accel() but designed for strings.                                                                                                                                   
    2040                 :  * @param string $string

    2045                 : function readstring_accel($string, $mimetype, $accelerate) {                                                                                                                               
    2046               0 :     global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                           
    2047                 :

    2052               0 :         header('Content-Type: '.$mimetype);                                                                                                                                                
    2053                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2054               0 :     header('Last-Modified: '. gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', time()) .' GMT');

    2056                 :

    2068                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2069                 :  * Handles the sending of temporary file to user, download is forced.                                                                                                                      
    2070                 :  * File is deleted after abort or successful sending, does not return, script terminated                                                                                                   
    2071                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2072                 :  * @param string $path path to file, preferably from moodledata/temp/something; or content of file itself

    2074                 :  * @param bool $pathisstring If the path is string                                                                                                                                         
    2075                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2076                 : function send_temp_file($path, $filename, $pathisstring=false) {                                                                                                                           
    2077               0 :     global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                           
    2078                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2079               0 :     if (check_browser_version('Firefox', '1.5')) {                                                                                                                                         
    2080                 :         // only FF is known to correctly save to disk before opening...                                                                                                                    
    2081               0 :         $mimetype = mimeinfo('type', $filename);                                                                                                                                           
    2082               0 :     } else {                                                                                                                                                                               
    2083               0 :         $mimetype = 'application/x-forcedownload';                                                                                                                                         
    2084                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2085                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2086                 :     // close session - not needed anymore                                                                                                                                                  
    2087               0 :     session_get_instance()->write_close();                                                                                                                                                 
    2088                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2089               0 :     if (!$pathisstring) {                                                                                                                                                                  
    2090               0 :         if (!file_exists($path)) {                                                                                                                                                         
    2091               0 :             send_header_404();                                                                                                                                                             
    2092               0 :             print_error('filenotfound', 'error', $CFG->wwwroot.'/');                                                                                                                       
    2093               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2094                 :         // executed after normal finish or abort                                                                                                                                           
    2095               0 :         @register_shutdown_function('send_temp_file_finished', $path);                                                                                                                     
    2096               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2097                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2098                 :     // if user is using IE, urlencode the filename so that multibyte file name will show up correctly on popup                                                                             
    2099               0 :     if (check_browser_version('MSIE')) {                                                                                                                                                   
    2100               0 :         $filename = urlencode($filename);                                                                                                                                                  
    2101               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2102                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2103               0 :     header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="'.$filename.'"');                                                                                                                   
    2104               0 :     if (strpos($CFG->wwwroot, 'https://') === 0) { //https sites - watch out for IE! KB812935 and KB316431

    2135                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2136                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2137                 :  * Handles the sending of file data to the user's browser, including support for                                                                                                           
    2138                 :  * byteranges etc.                                                                                                                                                                         
    2139                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2140                 :  * @category files                                                                                                                                                                         
    2141                 :  * @param string $path Path of file on disk (including real filename), or actual content of file as string                                                                                 
    2142                 :  * @param string $filename Filename to send                                                                                                                                                
    2143                 :  * @param int $lifetime Number of seconds before the file should expire from caches (default 24 hours)                                                                                     
    2144                 :  * @param int $filter 0 (default)=no filtering, 1=all files, 2=html files only                                                                                                             
    2145                 :  * @param bool $pathisstring If true (default false), $path is the content to send and not the pathname                                                                                    
    2146                 :  * @param bool $forcedownload If true (default false), forces download of file rather than view in browser/plugin                                                                          
    2147                 :  * @param string $mimetype Include to specify the MIME type; leave blank to have it guess the type from $filename                                                                          
    2148                 :  * @param bool $dontdie - return control to caller afterwards. this is not recommended and only used for cleanup tasks.                                                                    
    2149                 :  *                        if this is passed as true, ignore_user_abort is called.  if you don't want your processing to continue on cancel,                                                
    2150                 :  *                        you must detect this case when control is returned using connection_aborted. Please not that session is closed                                                   
    2151                 :  *                        and should not be reopened.                                                                                                                                      
    2152                 :  * @return null script execution stopped unless $dontdie is true                                                                                                                           
    2153                 :  */

    2158               0 :         ignore_user_abort(true);

    2255                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2256                 :  * Handles the sending of file data to the user's browser, including support for                                                                                                           
    2257                 :  * byteranges etc.                                                                                                                                                                         
    2258                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2259                 :  * The $options parameter supports the following keys:                                                                                                                                     
    2260                 :  *  (string|null) preview - send the preview of the file (e.g. "thumb" for a thumbnail)                                                                                                    
    2261                 :  *  (string|null) filename - overrides the implicit filename                                                                                                                               
    2262                 :  *  (bool) dontdie - return control to caller afterwards. this is not recommended and only used for cleanup tasks.                                                                         
    2263                 :  *      if this is passed as true, ignore_user_abort is called.  if you don't want your processing to continue on cancel,                                                                  
    2264                 :  *      you must detect this case when control is returned using connection_aborted. Please not that session is closed                                                                     
    2265                 :  *      and should not be reopened.                                                                                                                                                        
    2266                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2267                 :  * @category files                                                                                                                                                                         
    2268                 :  * @param stored_file $stored_file local file object                                                                                                                                       
    2269                 :  * @param int $lifetime Number of seconds before the file should expire from caches (default 24 hours)                                                                                     
    2270                 :  * @param int $filter 0 (default)=no filtering, 1=all files, 2=html files only                                                                                                             
    2271                 :  * @param bool $forcedownload If true (default false), forces download of file rather than view in browser/plugin                                                                          
    2272                 :  * @param array $options additional options affecting the file serving                                                                                                                     
    2273                 :  * @return null script execution stopped unless $options['dontdie'] is true                                                                                                                
    2274                 :  */

    2406                 : /**

    2411                 :  * @global moodle_database $DB

    2413                 :  * @param string $table The table to retrieve columns from                                                                                                                                 
    2414                 :  * @return bool|array Returns an array of CSV records or false                                                                                                                             
    2415                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2416                 : function get_records_csv($file, $table) {

    2421                 :     }

    2425               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2426                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2427               0 :     $fieldnames = fgetcsv($handle, 4096);

    2466                 : function put_records_csv($file, $records, $table = NULL) {

    2487               0 :     }

    2490               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2491                 :     else {                                                                                                                                                                                 
    2492               0 :         return false;                                                                                                                                                                      
    2493                 :     }

    2499               0 :     }

    2524                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2525                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2526                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2527                 :  * Recursively delete the file or folder with path $location. That is,                                                                                                                     
    2528                 :  * if it is a file delete it. If it is a folder, delete all its content                                                                                                                    
    2529                 :  * then delete it. If $location does not exist to start, that is not                                                                                                                       
    2530                 :  * considered an error.                                                                                                                                                                    
    2531                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2532                 :  * @param string $location the path to remove.                                                                                                                                             
    2533                 :  * @return bool                                                                                                                                                                            
    2534                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2535                 : function fulldelete($location) {                                                                                                                                                           
    2536               2 :     if (empty($location)) {                                                                                                                                                                
    2537                 :         // extra safety against wrong param                                                                                                                                                
    2538               0 :         return false;                                                                                                                                                                      
    2539                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2540               2 :     if (is_dir($location)) {                                                                                                                                                               
    2541               1 :         if (!$currdir = opendir($location)) {                                                                                                                                              
    2542               0 :             return false;                                                                                                                                                                  
    2543                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2544               1 :         while (false !== ($file = readdir($currdir))) {                                                                                                                                    
    2545               1 :             if ($file <> ".." && $file <> ".") {                                                                                                                                           
    2546               1 :                 $fullfile = $location."/".$file;                                                                                                                                           
    2547               1 :                 if (is_dir($fullfile)) {                                                                                                                                                   
    2548               1 :                     if (!fulldelete($fullfile)) {                                                                                                                                          
    2549               0 :                         return false;                                                                                                                                                      
    2550                 :                     }                                                                                                                                                                      
    2551               1 :                 } else {                                                                                                                                                                   
    2552               1 :                     if (!unlink($fullfile)) {                                                                                                                                              
    2553               0 :                         return false;                                                                                                                                                      
    2554                 :                     }                                                                                                                                                                      
    2555                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    2556               1 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2557               1 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2558               1 :         closedir($currdir);                                                                                                                                                                
    2559               1 :         if (! rmdir($location)) {                                                                                                                                                          
    2560               0 :             return false;                                                                                                                                                                  
    2561                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2562                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2563               2 :     } else if (file_exists($location)) {                                                                                                                                                   
    2564               0 :         if (!unlink($location)) {                                                                                                                                                          
    2565               0 :             return false;                                                                                                                                                                  
    2566                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2567               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2568               2 :     return true;                                                                                                                                                                           
    2569                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2570                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2571                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2572                 :  * Send requested byterange of file.                                                                                                                                                       
    2573                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2574                 :  * @param resource $handle A file handle                                                                                                                                                   
    2575                 :  * @param string $mimetype The mimetype for the output                                                                                                                                     
    2576                 :  * @param array $ranges An array of ranges to send                                                                                                                                         
    2577                 :  * @param string $filesize The size of the content if only one range is used                                                                                                               
    2578                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2579                 : function byteserving_send_file($handle, $mimetype, $ranges, $filesize) {                                                                                                                   
    2580                 :     // better turn off any kind of compression and buffering                                                                                                                               
    2581               0 :     @ini_set('zlib.output_compression', 'Off');                                                                                                                                            
    2582                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2583               0 :     $chunksize = 1*(1024*1024); // 1MB chunks - must be less than 2MB!                                                                                                                     
    2584               0 :     if ($handle === false) {                                                                                                                                                               
    2585               0 :         die;                                                                                                                                                                               
    2586                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2587               0 :     if (count($ranges) == 1) { //only one range requested                                                                                                                                  
    2588               0 :         $length = $ranges[0][2] - $ranges[0][1] + 1;                                                                                                                                       
    2589               0 :         header('HTTP/1.1 206 Partial content');                                                                                                                                            
    2590               0 :         header('Content-Length: '.$length);                                                                                                                                                
    2591               0 :         header('Content-Range: bytes '.$ranges[0][1].'-'.$ranges[0][2].'/'.$filesize);                                                                                                     
    2592               0 :         header('Content-Type: '.$mimetype);                                                                                                                                                
    2593                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2594               0 :         while(@ob_get_level()) {                                                                                                                                                           
    2595               0 :             if (!@ob_end_flush()) {                                                                                                                                                        
    2596               0 :                 break;                                                                                                                                                                     
    2597                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2598               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2599                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2600               0 :         fseek($handle, $ranges[0][1]);                                                                                                                                                     
    2601               0 :         while (!feof($handle) && $length > 0) {                                                                                                                                            
    2602               0 :             @set_time_limit(60*60); //reset time limit to 60 min - should be enough for 1 MB chunk                                                                                         
    2603               0 :             $buffer = fread($handle, ($chunksize < $length ? $chunksize : $length));                                                                                                       
    2604               0 :             echo $buffer;                                                                                                                                                                  
    2605               0 :             flush();                                                                                                                                                                       
    2606               0 :             $length -= strlen($buffer);                                                                                                                                                    
    2607               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2608               0 :         fclose($handle);                                                                                                                                                                   
    2609               0 :         die;                                                                                                                                                                               
    2610                 :     } else { // multiple ranges requested - not tested much                                                                                                                                
    2611               0 :         $totallength = 0;                                                                                                                                                                  
    2612               0 :         foreach($ranges as $range) {                                                                                                                                                       
    2613               0 :             $totallength += strlen($range[0]) + $range[2] - $range[1] + 1;                                                                                                                 
    2614               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2615               0 :         $totallength += strlen("\r\n--".BYTESERVING_BOUNDARY."--\r\n");                                                                                                                    
    2616               0 :         header('HTTP/1.1 206 Partial content');                                                                                                                                            
    2617               0 :         header('Content-Length: '.$totallength);                                                                                                                                           
    2618               0 :         header('Content-Type: multipart/byteranges; boundary='.BYTESERVING_BOUNDARY);                                                                                                      
    2619                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2620               0 :         while(@ob_get_level()) {                                                                                                                                                           
    2621               0 :             if (!@ob_end_flush()) {                                                                                                                                                        
    2622               0 :                 break;                                                                                                                                                                     
    2623                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2624               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2625                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2626               0 :         foreach($ranges as $range) {                                                                                                                                                       
    2627               0 :             $length = $range[2] - $range[1] + 1;                                                                                                                                           
    2628               0 :             echo $range[0];                                                                                                                                                                
    2629               0 :             fseek($handle, $range[1]);                                                                                                                                                     
    2630               0 :             while (!feof($handle) && $length > 0) {                                                                                                                                        
    2631               0 :                 @set_time_limit(60*60); //reset time limit to 60 min - should be enough for 1 MB chunk                                                                                     
    2632               0 :                 $buffer = fread($handle, ($chunksize < $length ? $chunksize : $length));                                                                                                   
    2633               0 :                 echo $buffer;                                                                                                                                                              
    2634               0 :                 flush();                                                                                                                                                                   
    2635               0 :                 $length -= strlen($buffer);                                                                                                                                                
    2636               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2637               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2638               0 :         echo "\r\n--".BYTESERVING_BOUNDARY."--\r\n";                                                                                                                                       
    2639               0 :         fclose($handle);                                                                                                                                                                   
    2640               0 :         die;                                                                                                                                                                               
    2641                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2642                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2643                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2644                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2645                 :  * add includes (js and css) into uploaded files

    2647                 :  *

    2653                 : function file_modify_html_header($text) {                                                                                                                                                  
    2654                 :     // first look for <head> tag                                                                                                                                                           
    2655               0 :     global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                           
    2656                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2657               0 :     $stylesheetshtml = '';
