    2659                 :         //TODO: MDL-21120                                                                                                                                                                  
    2660                 :         $stylesheetshtml .= '<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="'.$stylesheet.'" />'."\n";                                                                                       
    2661                 :     }*/                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2662                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2663               0 :     $ufo = '';                                                                                                                                                                             
    2664               0 :     if (filter_is_enabled('filter/mediaplugin')) {                                                                                                                                         
    2665                 :         // this script is needed by most media filter plugins.                                                                                                                             
    2666               0 :         $attributes = array('type'=>'text/javascript', 'src'=>$CFG->httpswwwroot . '/lib/ufo.js');                                                                                         
    2667               0 :         $ufo = html_writer::tag('script', '', $attributes) . "\n";                                                                                                                         
    2668               0 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2669                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2670               0 :     preg_match('/\<head\>|\<HEAD\>/', $text, $matches);                                                                                                                                    
    2671               0 :     if ($matches) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    2672               0 :         $replacement = '<head>'.$ufo.$stylesheetshtml;                                                                                                                                     
    2673               0 :         $text = preg_replace('/\<head\>|\<HEAD\>/', $replacement, $text, 1);                                                                                                               
    2674               0 :         return $text;                                                                                                                                                                      
    2675                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2676                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2677                 :     // if not, look for <html> tag, and stick <head> right after                                                                                                                           
    2678               0 :     preg_match('/\<html\>|\<HTML\>/', $text, $matches);                                                                                                                                    
    2679               0 :     if ($matches) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    2680                 :         // replace <html> tag with <html><head>includes</head>                                                                                                                             
    2681               0 :         $replacement = '<html>'."\n".'<head>'.$ufo.$stylesheetshtml.'</head>';                                                                                                             
    2682               0 :         $text = preg_replace('/\<html\>|\<HTML\>/', $replacement, $text, 1);                                                                                                               
    2683               0 :         return $text;                                                                                                                                                                      
    2684                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2685                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2686                 :     // if not, look for <body> tag, and stick <head> before body                                                                                                                           
    2687               0 :     preg_match('/\<body\>|\<BODY\>/', $text, $matches);                                                                                                                                    
    2688               0 :     if ($matches) {                                                                                                                                                                        
    2689               0 :         $replacement = '<head>'.$ufo.$stylesheetshtml.'</head>'."\n".'<body>';                                                                                                             
    2690               0 :         $text = preg_replace('/\<body\>|\<BODY\>/', $replacement, $text, 1);                                                                                                               
    2691               0 :         return $text;                                                                                                                                                                      
    2692                 :     }

    2695               0 :     $text = '<head>'.$ufo.$stylesheetshtml.'</head>'."\n".$text;                                                                                                                           
    2696               0 :     return $text;                                                                                                                                                                          
    2697                 : }                                                                                                                                                                                          
    2698                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2699                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2700                 :  * RESTful cURL class                                                                                                                                                                      
    2701                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2702                 :  * This is a wrapper class for curl, it is quite easy to use:                                                                                                                              
    2703                 :  * <code>                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2704                 :  * $c = new curl;                                                                                                                                                                          
    2705                 :  * // enable cache                                                                                                                                                                         
    2706                 :  * $c = new curl(array('cache'=>true));                                                                                                                                                    
    2707                 :  * // enable cookie                                                                                                                                                                        
    2708                 :  * $c = new curl(array('cookie'=>true));                                                                                                                                                   
    2709                 :  * // enable proxy                                                                                                                                                                         
    2710                 :  * $c = new curl(array('proxy'=>true));                                                                                                                                                    
    2711                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2712                 :  * // HTTP GET Method                                                                                                                                                                      
    2713                 :  * $html = $c->get('http://example.com');                                                                                                                                                  
    2714                 :  * // HTTP POST Method                                                                                                                                                                     
    2715                 :  * $html = $c->post('http://example.com/', array('q'=>'words', 'name'=>'moodle'));                                                                                                         
    2716                 :  * // HTTP PUT Method                                                                                                                                                                      
    2717                 :  * $html = $c->put('http://example.com/', array('file'=>'/var/www/test.txt');                                                                                                              
    2718                 :  * </code>                                                                                                                                                                                 
    2719                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    2720                 :  * @package   core_files                                                                                                                                                                   
    2721                 :  * @category files                                                                                                                                                                         
    2722                 :  * @copyright Dongsheng Cai <dongsheng@moodle.com>                                                                                                                                         
    2723                 :  * @license   http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU Public License                                                                                                                      
    2724                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    2725                 : class curl {                                                                                                                                                                               
    2726                 :     /** @var bool Caches http request contents */                                                                                                                                          
    2727                 :     public  $cache    = false;                                                                                                                                                             
    2728                 :     /** @var bool Uses proxy */                                                                                                                                                            
    2729                 :     public  $proxy    = false;                                                                                                                                                             
    2730                 :     /** @var string library version */                                                                                                                                                     
    2731                 :     public  $version  = '0.4 dev';                                                                                                                                                         
    2732                 :     /** @var array http's response */                                                                                                                                                      
    2733                 :     public  $response = array();                                                                                                                                                           
    2734                 :     /** @var array http header */                                                                                                                                                          
    2735                 :     public  $header   = array();                                                                                                                                                           
    2736                 :     /** @var string cURL information */                                                                                                                                                    
    2737                 :     public  $info;                                                                                                                                                                         
    2738                 :     /** @var string error */                                                                                                                                                               
    2739                 :     public  $error;                                                                                                                                                                        
    2740                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2741                 :     /** @var array cURL options */                                                                                                                                                         
    2742                 :     private $options;                                                                                                                                                                      
    2743                 :     /** @var string Proxy host */                                                                                                                                                          
    2744                 :     private $proxy_host = '';                                                                                                                                                              
    2745                 :     /** @var string Proxy auth */                                                                                                                                                          
    2746                 :     private $proxy_auth = '';                                                                                                                                                              
    2747                 :     /** @var string Proxy type */                                                                                                                                                          
    2748                 :     private $proxy_type = '';                                                                                                                                                              
    2749                 :     /** @var bool Debug mode on */                                                                                                                                                         
    2750                 :     private $debug    = false;                                                                                                                                                             
    2751                 :     /** @var bool|string Path to cookie file */                                                                                                                                            
    2752                 :     private $cookie   = false;                                                                                                                                                             
    2753                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2754                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2755                 :      * Constructor                                                                                                                                                                         
    2756                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2757                 :      * @global stdClass $CFG                                                                                                                                                               
    2758                 :      * @param array $options                                                                                                                                                               
    2759                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2760                 :     public function __construct($options = array()){                                                                                                                                       
    2761               0 :         global $CFG;                                                                                                                                                                       
    2762               0 :         if (!function_exists('curl_init')) {                                                                                                                                               
    2763               0 :             $this->error = 'cURL module must be enabled!';                                                                                                                                 
    2764               0 :             trigger_error($this->error, E_USER_ERROR);                                                                                                                                     
    2765               0 :             return false;                                                                                                                                                                  
    2766                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2767                 :         // the options of curl should be init here.                                                                                                                                        
    2768               0 :         $this->resetopt();                                                                                                                                                                 
    2769               0 :         if (!empty($options['debug'])) {                                                                                                                                                   
    2770               0 :             $this->debug = true;                                                                                                                                                           
    2771               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2772               0 :         if(!empty($options['cookie'])) {                                                                                                                                                   
    2773               0 :             if($options['cookie'] === true) {                                                                                                                                              
    2774               0 :                 $this->cookie = $CFG->dataroot.'/curl_cookie.txt';                                                                                                                         
    2775               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                       
    2776               0 :                 $this->cookie = $options['cookie'];                                                                                                                                        
    2777                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2778               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2779               0 :         if (!empty($options['cache'])) {                                                                                                                                                   
    2780               0 :             if (class_exists('curl_cache')) {

    2819               0 :         $this->options['CURLOPT_USERAGENT']         = 'MoodleBot/1.0';                                                                                                                     
    2820                 :         // True to include the header in the output                                                                                                                                        
    2821               0 :         $this->options['CURLOPT_HEADER']            = 0;                                                                                                                                   
    2822                 :         // True to Exclude the body from the output                                                                                                                                        
    2823               0 :         $this->options['CURLOPT_NOBODY']            = 0;                                                                                                                                   
    2824                 :         // TRUE to follow any "Location: " header that the server                                                                                                                          
    2825                 :         // sends as part of the HTTP header (note this is recursive,                                                                                                                       
    2826                 :         // PHP will follow as many "Location: " headers that it is sent,                                                                                                                   
    2827                 :         // unless CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS is set).                                                                                                                                               
    2828                 :         //$this->options['CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION']    = 1;                                                                                                                                 
    2829               0 :         $this->options['CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS']         = 10;                                                                                                                                  
    2830               0 :         $this->options['CURLOPT_ENCODING']          = '';                                                                                                                                  
    2831                 :         // TRUE to return the transfer as a string of the return                                                                                                                           
    2832                 :         // value of curl_exec() instead of outputting it out directly.                                                                                                                     
    2833               0 :         $this->options['CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER']    = 1;

    2908                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2909                 :      * private callback function                                                                                                                                                           
    2910                 :      * Formatting HTTP Response Header                                                                                                                                                     
    2911                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2912                 :      * @param resource $ch Apparently not used                                                                                                                                             
    2913                 :      * @param string $header                                                                                                                                                               
    2914                 :      * @return int The strlen of the header                                                                                                                                                
    2915                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2916                 :     private function formatHeader($ch, $header)                                                                                                                                            
    2917                 :     {                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2918               0 :         $this->count++;                                                                                                                                                                    
    2919               0 :         if (strlen($header) > 2) {                                                                                                                                                         
    2920               0 :             list($key, $value) = explode(" ", rtrim($header, "\r\n"), 2);                                                                                                                  
    2921               0 :             $key = rtrim($key, ':');                                                                                                                                                       
    2922               0 :             if (!empty($this->response[$key])) {                                                                                                                                           
    2923               0 :                 if (is_array($this->response[$key])){                                                                                                                                      
    2924               0 :                     $this->response[$key][] = $value;                                                                                                                                      
    2925               0 :                 } else {                                                                                                                                                                   
    2926               0 :                     $tmp = $this->response[$key];                                                                                                                                          
    2927               0 :                     $this->response[$key] = array();                                                                                                                                       
    2928               0 :                     $this->response[$key][] = $tmp;                                                                                                                                        
    2929               0 :                     $this->response[$key][] = $value;                                                                                                                                      
    2930                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2931                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    2932               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                       
    2933               0 :                 $this->response[$key] = $value;                                                                                                                                            
    2934                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2935               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2936               0 :         return strlen($header);                                                                                                                                                            
    2937                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2938                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2939                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2940                 :      * Set options for individual curl instance                                                                                                                                            
    2941                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2942                 :      * @param resource $curl A curl handle                                                                                                                                                 
    2943                 :      * @param array $options                                                                                                                                                               
    2944                 :      * @return resource The curl handle                                                                                                                                                    
    2945                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2946                 :     private function apply_opt($curl, $options) {                                                                                                                                          
    2947                 :         // Clean up                                                                                                                                                                        
    2948               0 :         $this->cleanopt();                                                                                                                                                                 
    2949                 :         // set cookie                                                                                                                                                                      
    2950               0 :         if (!empty($this->cookie) || !empty($options['cookie'])) {                                                                                                                         
    2951               0 :             $this->setopt(array('cookiejar'=>$this->cookie,                                                                                                                                
    2952               0 :                             'cookiefile'=>$this->cookie                                                                                                                                    
    2953               0 :                              ));                                                                                                                                                           
    2954               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2955                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2956                 :         // set proxy                                                                                                                                                                       
    2957               0 :         if (!empty($this->proxy) || !empty($options['proxy'])) {                                                                                                                           
    2958               0 :             $this->setopt($this->proxy);                                                                                                                                                   
    2959               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2960               0 :         $this->setopt($options);                                                                                                                                                           
    2961                 :         // reset before set options                                                                                                                                                        
    2962               0 :         curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HEADERFUNCTION, array(&$this,'formatHeader'));                                                                                                          
    2963                 :         // set headers                                                                                                                                                                     
    2964               0 :         if (empty($this->header)){                                                                                                                                                         
    2965               0 :             $this->setHeader(array(                                                                                                                                                        
    2966               0 :                 'User-Agent: MoodleBot/1.0',                                                                                                                                               
    2967               0 :                 'Accept-Charset: ISO-8859-1,utf-8;q=0.7,*;q=0.7',                                                                                                                          
    2968                 :                 'Connection: keep-alive'                                                                                                                                                   
    2969               0 :                 ));                                                                                                                                                                        
    2970               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2971               0 :         curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $this->header);                                                                                                                             
    2972                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2973               0 :         if ($this->debug){                                                                                                                                                                 
    2974               0 :             echo '<h1>Options</h1>';                                                                                                                                                       
    2975               0 :             var_dump($this->options);                                                                                                                                                      
    2976               0 :             echo '<h1>Header</h1>';                                                                                                                                                        
    2977               0 :             var_dump($this->header);                                                                                                                                                       
    2978               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2979                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2980                 :         // set options                                                                                                                                                                     
    2981               0 :         foreach($this->options as $name => $val) {                                                                                                                                         
    2982               0 :             if (is_string($name)) {                                                                                                                                                        
    2983               0 :                 $name = constant(strtoupper($name));                                                                                                                                       
    2984               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    2985               0 :             curl_setopt($curl, $name, $val);                                                                                                                                               
    2986               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    2987               0 :         return $curl;                                                                                                                                                                      
    2988                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    2989                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    2990                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                    
    2991                 :      * Download multiple files in parallel                                                                                                                                                 
    2992                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2993                 :      * Calls {@link multi()} with specific download headers                                                                                                                                
    2994                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                     
    2995                 :      * <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
    2996                 :      * $c = new curl;                                                                                                                                                                      
    2997                 :      * $c->download(array(                                                                                                                                                                 
    2998                 :      *              array('url'=>'http://localhost/', 'file'=>fopen('a', 'wb')),                                                                                                           
    2999                 :      *              array('url'=>'http://localhost/20/', 'file'=>fopen('b', 'wb'))                                                                                                         
    3000                 :      *              ));                                                                                                                                                                    
    3001                 :      * </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
    3002                 :      *

    3006                 :      */

    3009               0 :         $options['RETURNTRANSFER'] = false;

    3011                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    3012                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3013                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3014                 :      * Mulit HTTP Requests                                                                                                                                                                 
    3015                 :      * This function could run multi-requests in parallel.                                                                                                                                 
    3016                 :      *                                                                                                                                                                                     
    3017                 :      * @param array $requests An array of files to request                                                                                                                                 
    3018                 :      * @param array $options An array of options to set                                                                                                                                    
    3019                 :      * @return array An array of results                                                                                                                                                   
    3020                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3021                 :     protected function multi($requests, $options = array()) {                                                                                                                              
    3022               0 :         $count   = count($requests);                                                                                                                                                       
    3023               0 :         $handles = array();                                                                                                                                                                
    3024               0 :         $results = array();                                                                                                                                                                
    3025               0 :         $main    = curl_multi_init();                                                                                                                                                      
    3026               0 :         for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++) {                                                                                                                                                  
    3027               0 :             $url = $requests[$i];                                                                                                                                                          
    3028               0 :             foreach($url as $n=>$v){                                                                                                                                                       
    3029               0 :                 $options[$n] = $url[$n];                                                                                                                                                   
    3030               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    3031               0 :             $handles[$i] = curl_init($url['url']);                                                                                                                                         
    3032               0 :             $this->apply_opt($handles[$i], $options);                                                                                                                                      
    3033               0 :             curl_multi_add_handle($main, $handles[$i]);                                                                                                                                    
    3034               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3035               0 :         $running = 0;                                                                                                                                                                      
    3036                 :         do {                                                                                                                                                                               
    3037               0 :             curl_multi_exec($main, $running);                                                                                                                                              
    3038               0 :         } while($running > 0);                                                                                                                                                             
    3039               0 :         for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++) {                                                                                                                                                  
    3040               0 :             if (!empty($options['CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER'])) {                                                                                                                              
    3041               0 :                 $results[] = true;                                                                                                                                                         
    3042               0 :             } else {                                                                                                                                                                       
    3043               0 :                 $results[] = curl_multi_getcontent($handles[$i]);                                                                                                                          
    3044                 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    3045               0 :             curl_multi_remove_handle($main, $handles[$i]);                                                                                                                                 
    3046               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3047               0 :         curl_multi_close($main);                                                                                                                                                           
    3048               0 :         return $results;                                                                                                                                                                   
    3049                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    3050                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3051                 :     /**

    3058                 :     protected function request($url, $options = array()){                                                                                                                                  
    3059                 :         // create curl instance                                                                                                                                                            
    3060               0 :         $curl = curl_init($url);                                                                                                                                                           
    3061               0 :         $options['url'] = $url;                                                                                                                                                            
    3062               0 :         $this->apply_opt($curl, $options);                                                                                                                                                 
    3063               0 :         if ($this->cache && $ret = $this->cache->get($this->options)) {                                                                                                                    
    3064               0 :             return $ret;                                                                                                                                                                   
    3065                 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                           
    3066               0 :             $ret = curl_exec($curl);                                                                                                                                                       
    3067               0 :             if ($this->cache) {                                                                                                                                                            
    3068               0 :                 $this->cache->set($this->options, $ret);                                                                                                                                   
    3069               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    3070                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3071                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3072               0 :         $this->info  = curl_getinfo($curl);                                                                                                                                                
    3073               0 :         $this->error = curl_error($curl);                                                                                                                                                  
    3074                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3075               0 :         if ($this->debug){                                                                                                                                                                 
    3076               0 :             echo '<h1>Return Data</h1>';                                                                                                                                                   
    3077               0 :             var_dump($ret);                                                                                                                                                                
    3078               0 :             echo '<h1>Info</h1>';                                                                                                                                                          
    3079               0 :             var_dump($this->info);                                                                                                                                                         
    3080               0 :             echo '<h1>Error</h1>';                                                                                                                                                         
    3081               0 :             var_dump($this->error);                                                                                                                                                        
    3082               0 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3083                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3084               0 :         curl_close($curl);                                                                                                                                                                 
    3085                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3086               0 :         if (empty($this->error)){                                                                                                                                                          
    3087               0 :             return $ret;                                                                                                                                                                   
    3088                 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                           
    3089               0 :             return $this->error;                                                                                                                                                           
    3090                 :             // exception is not ajax friendly                                                                                                                                              
    3091                 :             //throw new moodle_exception($this->error, 'curl');                                                                                                                            
    3092                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3093                 :     }                                                                                                                                                                                      
    3094                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3095                 :     /**

    3104                 :     public function head($url, $options = array()){

    3111                 :     /**

    3119                 :     public function post($url, $params = '', $options = array()){                                                                                                                          
    3120               0 :         $options['CURLOPT_POST']       = 1;                                                                                                                                                
    3121               0 :         if (is_array($params)) {                                                                                                                                                           
    3122               0 :             $this->_tmp_file_post_params = array();                                                                                                                                        
    3123               0 :             foreach ($params as $key => $value) {                                                                                                                                          
    3124               0 :                 if ($value instanceof stored_file) {                                                                                                                                       
    3125               0 :                     $value->add_to_curl_request($this, $key);                                                                                                                              
    3126               0 :                 } else {                                                                                                                                                                   
    3127               0 :                     $this->_tmp_file_post_params[$key] = $value;                                                                                                                           
    3128                 :                 }                                                                                                                                                                          
    3129               0 :             }                                                                                                                                                                              
    3130               0 :             $options['CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS'] = $this->_tmp_file_post_params;                                                                                                                 
    3131               0 :             unset($this->_tmp_file_post_params);                                                                                                                                           
    3132               0 :         } else {                                                                                                                                                                           
    3133                 :             // $params is the raw post data                                                                                                                                                
    3134               0 :             $options['CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS'] = $params;                                                                                                                                      
    3135                 :         }                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3136               0 :         return $this->request($url, $options);                                                                                                                                             
    3137                 :     }

    3235                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3236                 : /**                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3237                 :  * This class is used by cURL class, use case:                                                                                                                                             
    3238                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3239                 :  * <code>                                                                                                                                                                                  
    3240                 :  * $CFG->repositorycacheexpire = 120;                                                                                                                                                      
    3241                 :  * $CFG->curlcache = 120;                                                                                                                                                                  
    3242                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3243                 :  * $c = new curl(array('cache'=>true), 'module_cache'=>'repository');                                                                                                                      
    3244                 :  * $ret = $c->get('http://www.google.com');                                                                                                                                                
    3245                 :  * </code>                                                                                                                                                                                 
    3246                 :  *                                                                                                                                                                                         
    3247                 :  * @package   core_files                                                                                                                                                                   
    3248                 :  * @copyright Dongsheng Cai <dongsheng@moodle.com>                                                                                                                                         
    3249                 :  * @license   http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later                                                                                                                     
    3250                 :  */                                                                                                                                                                                        
    3251                 : class curl_cache {                                                                                                                                                                         
    3252                 :     /** @var string Path to cache directory */                                                                                                                                             
    3253                 :     public $dir = '';                                                                                                                                                                      
    3254                 :                                                                                                                                                                                            
    3255                 :     /**                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3256                 :      * Constructor                                                                                                                                                                         
    3257                 :      *

    3259                 :      * @param string $module which module is using curl_cache                                                                                                                              
    3260                 :      */                                                                                                                                                                                    
    3261                 :     public function __construct($module = 'repository') {                                                                                                                                  
    3262               0 :         global $CFG;
